system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision menu separator. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2014-05-14 23:08:26 -0700 (Wed, 14 May 2014) $" revision: "$Revision: 95062 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xmlEV_MENU_SEPARATOR_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_menu_separator_i.xmlEV_MENU_SEPARATOR_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_motion_actions_internalpointer_motion_actions_internal, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_button_press_actions_internalpointer_button_press_actions_internal, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_double_press_actions_internalpointer_double_press_actions_internal end
../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xmlEV_MENU_ITEM_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_enable_sensitiveenable_sensitive, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_disable_sensitivedisable_sensitive, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_disposedispose, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_motion_actions_internalpointer_motion_actions_internal, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_button_press_actions_internalpointer_button_press_actions_internal, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_double_press_actions_internalpointer_double_press_actions_internal end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Do nothing because an empty GtkMenuItem is a separator. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_menu_item_newgtk_menu_item_new) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_showgtk_widget_show (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_set_sensitivegtk_widget_set_sensitive (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, False) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_set_usizegtk_widget_set_usize (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, -1, 8) ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmapable_imp_initializepixmapable_imp_initialize ../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xml#f_textable_imp_initializetextable_imp_initialize ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_initialize_menu_sep_boxinitialize_menu_sep_box create ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_radio_group_refradio_group_ref ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive := True ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
f_initialize_menu_sep_box../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_initialize_menu_sep_boxinitialize_menu_sep_box -- Create and initialize menu item box. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_boxbox := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_hbox_newgtk_hbox_new (False, 0) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_object_refobject_ref (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_boxbox) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_object_sinkgtk_object_sink (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_boxbox) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_box_pack_startgtk_box_pack_start (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_boxbox, ../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xml#f_text_labeltext_label, True, True, 0) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_box_pack_startgtk_box_pack_start (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_boxbox, ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box, True, True, 0) end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_is_sensitive../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is the object sensitive to user input.
f_enable_sensitive../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_enable_sensitiveenable_sensitive -- Implemented to fulfill assertions but leave c_object unsensitive. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive := True end
f_disable_sensitive../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_disable_sensitivedisable_sensitive -- Implemented to fulfill assertions but leave c_object unsensitive. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive := False end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_list_imp.xmlEV_MENU_ITEM_LIST_IMP} -- Implementation
f_dispose../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_disposedispose -- Unreference unwanted gtk widgets. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_object_unrefobject_unref (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_boxbox) ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_disposePrecursor end
f_box../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_boxbox: FalsePOINTER -- Dummy hbox used for holding *able widgets to satisfy invariants.
f_radio_group_ref../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_radio_group_refradio_group_ref: FalsePOINTER_REF
f_set_radio_group../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_set_radio_groupset_radio_group (p: FalsePOINTER) -- Assign p to ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_radio_group_refradio_group_ref.Falseset_item (p) end
f_radio_group../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group: FalsePOINTER -- GSList with all radio items of this container. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_radio_group_refradio_group_ref.Falseitem end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_pointer_motion_actions_internal../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_motion_actions_internalpointer_motion_actions_internal: detachable ../interface/ev_pointer_motion_action_sequence.xmlEV_POINTER_MOTION_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Implementation of once per object ../implementation_interface/ev_item_action_sequences_i.xml#f_pointer_motion_actionspointer_motion_actions. note option: stable attribute end
f_pointer_button_press_actions_internal../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_button_press_actions_internalpointer_button_press_actions_internal: detachable ../interface/ev_pointer_button_action_sequence.xmlEV_POINTER_BUTTON_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Implementation of once per object ../implementation_interface/ev_item_action_sequences_i.xml#f_pointer_button_press_actionspointer_button_press_actions. note option: stable attribute end
f_pointer_double_press_actions_internal../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_pointer_double_press_actions_internalpointer_double_press_actions_internal: detachable ../interface/ev_pointer_button_action_sequence.xmlEV_POINTER_BUTTON_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Implementation of once per object ../implementation_interface/ev_item_action_sequences_i.xml#f_pointer_double_press_actionspointer_double_press_actions. note option: stable attribute end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_menu_separator.xmlEV_MENU_SEPARATOR note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_separator_imp.xmlEV_MENU_SEPARATOR_IMP
